column1: Product or process innovations with environmental benefits, by industry and enterprise size
Geography: Canada, Geographical region of Canada, Province or territory

column2: Innovations with environmental benefits from production through efficient use of resources 2
column3: Improved resource efficiency through reduced material use per unit of output
column4: Improved resource efficiency through reduced energy use per unit of output
column5: Improved resource efficiency by replacing material with less greenhouse-gas-intensive alternatives
column6: Reduced consumption of resources through recycling (water, waste or material)
column7: Renewable fuels (ethanol, biodiesel, biogas, biochar, hydrogen)

column1: Mining, quarrying, and oil and gas extraction
Postal services, couriers and messengers, warehousing and storage 6
Finance and insurance excluding monetary authorities 7
Real estate and rental and leasing
Administrative and support, waste management and remediation services

column2: Regional distribution by size of enterprise is not available.

"Innovations with environmental benefits from production through efficient use of resources" includes enterprises that introduced product or process innovations with any of the specified environmental benefits.
Includes North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes 11, 21, 22, 23, 31-33, 41, 44-45, 48-49, 51, 52, 53, 54, 55 and 56.
Includes North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes 41, 44-45, 48-49, 51, 52, 53, 54, 55 and 56.
Includes North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes 481, 482, 483, 484, 485, 486, 487 and 488.
Includes North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes 491, 492 and 493.
Includes North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes 52 except 521.
